content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH ( 
		LOCATION = 'abfss://confirm@azdevsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE staging.SalesPerson (
	[BusinessEntityID] nvarchar(4000),
	[Title] nvarchar(4000),
	[FirstName] nvarchar(4000),
	[MiddleName] nvarchar(4000),
	[LastName] nvarchar(4000),
	[Suffix] nvarchar(4000),
	[JobTitle] nvarchar(4000),
	[PhoneNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[PhoneNumberType] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmailAddress] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmailPromotion] nvarchar(4000),
	[AddressLine1] nvarchar(4000),
	[AddressLine2] nvarchar(4000),
	[City] nvarchar(4000),
	[StateProvinceName] nvarchar(4000),
	[PostalCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[CountryRegionName] nvarchar(4000),
	[TerritoryName] nvarchar(4000),
	[TerritoryGroup] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'confirm_Sales_Person.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Staging.SalesOrderDetail (
	[SalesOrderID] nvarchar(4000),
	[SalesOrderDetailID] nvarchar(4000),
	[CarrierTrackingNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[OrderQty] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductID] nvarchar(4000),
	[SpecialOfferID] nvarchar(4000),
	[UnitPrice] nvarchar(4000),
	[UnitPriceDiscount] nvarchar(4000),
	[LineTotal] nvarchar(4000),
	[rowguid] nvarchar(4000),
	[ModifiedDate] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'confirm_Sales_Order_Detail.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Staging.SalesOrder (
	[SalesOrderID] nvarchar(4000),
	[RevisionNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[OrderDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[DueDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[ShipDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[Status] nvarchar(4000),
	[OnlineOrderFlag] nvarchar(4000),
	[SalesOrderNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[PurchaseOrderNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[AccountNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[CustomerID] nvarchar(4000),
	[SalesPersonID] nvarchar(4000),
	[TerritoryID] nvarchar(4000),
	[BillToAddressID] nvarchar(4000),
	[ShipToAddressID] nvarchar(4000),
	[ShipMethodID] nvarchar(4000),
	[CreditCardID] nvarchar(4000),
	[CreditCardApprovalCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[CurrencyRateID] nvarchar(4000),
	[SubTotal] nvarchar(4000),
	[TaxAmt] nvarchar(4000),
	[Freight] nvarchar(4000),
	[TotalDue] nvarchar(4000),
	[Comment] nvarchar(4000),
	[rowguid] nvarchar(4000),
	[ModifiedDate] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'confirm_Sales_Order.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Staging.Product (
	[ProductID] nvarchar(4000),
	[Name] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[MakeFlag] nvarchar(4000),
	[FinishedGoodsFlag] nvarchar(4000),
	[Color] nvarchar(4000),
	[SafetyStockLevel] nvarchar(4000),
	[ReorderPoint] nvarchar(4000),
	[StandardCost] nvarchar(4000),
	[ListPrice] nvarchar(4000),
	[Size] nvarchar(4000),
	[SizeUnitMeasureCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[WeightUnitMeasureCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[Weight] nvarchar(4000),
	[DaysToManufacture] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductLine] nvarchar(4000),
	[Class] nvarchar(4000),
	[Style] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductSubcategoryID] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductModelID] nvarchar(4000),
	[SellStartDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[SellEndDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[DiscontinuedDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[rowguid] nvarchar(4000),
	[ModifiedDate] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'confirm_PRODUCT_INFO.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Staging.Product_Category (
	[ProductSubcategoryID] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductCategoryID] nvarchar(4000),
	[Name] nvarchar(4000),
	[rowguid] nvarchar(4000),
	[ModifiedDate] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'confirm_Product_Category.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Staging.Customer (
	[BusinessEntityID] nvarchar(4000),
	[Title] nvarchar(4000),
	[FirstName] nvarchar(4000),
	[MiddleName] nvarchar(4000),
	[LastName] nvarchar(4000),
	[Suffix] nvarchar(4000),
	[PhoneNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[PhoneNumberType] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmailAddress] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmailPromotion] nvarchar(4000),
	[AddressType] nvarchar(4000),
	[AddressLine1] nvarchar(4000),
	[AddressLine2] nvarchar(4000),
	[City] nvarchar(4000),
	[StateProvinceName] nvarchar(4000),
	[PostalCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[CountryRegionName] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'confirm_CUSTOMER_INFO.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE staging.DimDate (
    DateKey INT,
    FullDate DATE,
    Day INT,
    DayOfWeek INT,
    DayOfWeekName VARCHAR(20),
    DayOfYear INT,
    WeekOfYear INT,
    Month INT,
    MonthName VARCHAR(20),
    Quarter INT,
    Year INT,
    IsWeekend BIT,
    IsHoliday BIT -- Optionally, you can also add a flag for holidays
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'confirm_DateDim.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO
